org.apache.flink.streaming.util.typeutils

类 FieldAccessor<T,F>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.util.typeutils.FieldAccessor<T,F>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    直接已知子类:
    FieldAccessor.ArrayFieldAccessor, FieldAccessor.PojoFieldAccessor, FieldAccessor.RecursiveProductFieldAccessor, FieldAccessor.RecursiveTupleFieldAccessor, FieldAccessor.SimpleFieldAccessor, FieldAccessor.SimpleProductFieldAccessor, FieldAccessor.SimpleTupleFieldAccessor

    @Internal
public abstract class FieldAccessor<T,F>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    These classes encapsulate the logic of accessing a field specified by the user as either an index or a field expression string. TypeInformation can also be requested for the field. The position index might specify a field of a Tuple, an array, or a simple type(only "0th field").

    Field expressions that specify nested fields (e.g. "f1.a.foo") result in nested field accessors. These penetrate one layer, and then delegate the rest of the work to an "innerAccesor". (see PojoFieldAccessor, RecursiveTupleFieldAccessor, RecursiveProductFieldAccessor)

    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      (专用程序包) static class  FieldAccessor.ArrayFieldAccessor<T,F> 
      (专用程序包) static class  FieldAccessor.PojoFieldAccessor<T,R,F> 
      (专用程序包) static class  FieldAccessor.RecursiveProductFieldAccessor<T,R,F> 
      (专用程序包) static class  FieldAccessor.RecursiveTupleFieldAccessor<T extends Tuple,R,F> 
      (专用程序包) static class  FieldAccessor.SimpleFieldAccessor<T>
      This is when the entire record is considered as a single field.
      (专用程序包) static class  FieldAccessor.SimpleProductFieldAccessor<T,F>
      There are two versions of ProductFieldAccessor, differing in whether there is an other FieldAccessor nested inside.
      (专用程序包) static class  FieldAccessor.SimpleTupleFieldAccessor<T extends Tuple,F>
      There are two versions of TupleFieldAccessor, differing in whether there is an other FieldAccessor nested inside.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getFieldType

        public TypeInformation<F> getFieldType()
        Gets the TypeInformation for the type of the field. Note: For an array of a primitive type, it returns the corresponding basic type (Integer for int[]).

      • get

        public abstract F get(T record)
        Gets the value of the field (specified in the constructor) of the given record.
        参数:
        record - The record on which the field will be accessed
        返回:
        The value of the field.

      • set

        public abstract T set(T record,
                      F fieldValue)
        Sets the field (specified in the constructor) of the given record to the given value.

        Warning: This might modify the original object, or might return a new object instance. (This is necessary, because the record might be immutable.)

        参数:
        record - The record to modify
        fieldValue - The new value of the field
        返回:
        A record that has the given field value. (this might be a new instance or the original)
